docs.title: Developer Diary
docs.text: This document serves as a diary for the development of this package. It is intended to provide insights into the development process, decisions made, and tools used.

Setup

  • Setup a devcontainer.
  • Followed this blog for uv setup a package.

Tooling

  • Started to utilise uv for python project management.
  • Started to utilise git-cliff for changelog generation.

Docs

  • Installed mkdocs and created documentation in github pages.
  • Leverage mkdocs admonitions.
  • Added mkdocs-material theme.

docs.title: Useful Commands
docs.text:
python --version
uv --version
mkdocs gh-deploy
mkdocs serve
git-cliff -c cliff.toml
uv add requests
uv remove requests
uv lock --upgrade-package requests
uv build
uv init --lib my-package
pip install -e .
